changelog:
* Show an explicit warning when host communication latency is high.
* Show warning on Ripple destination tag missing.
* Use LED effect for BLE pairing.
* Deprecate ETH Holesky testnet and use Hoodi testnet instead.
* Erase BLE bonds too after entering wipe code.
* Restart BLE advertising after re-enabling BLE.
* Fix false "NO USB CONNECTION" warning on the home screen.
* Fix homescreen LED blinking.
* Fixed battery drain when waiting for unofficial firmware confirmation.
* Improve speed of translations upload over bluetooth.
* Adjust random part of BLE device name during pairing.
* Synchronize LED and background in tutorial.
* Restart bluetooth on reboot from device menu.
* Removed warning screen for some non-ERC20 contract calls.
* Removed "More info" menu item from screens that don't have more info.
* Fixed touch issue causing stuck hold-to-confirm buttons.
* Reduce +/- buttons' size to allow more text to fit.
* Add missing `get_serial_number` handler.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* Show an explicit warning when host communication latency is high.
* Use LED effect for BLE pairing.
* Erase BLE bonds too after entering wipe code.

* Fix homescreen LED blinking.

* Improve speed of translations upload over bluetooth.
* Adjust random part of BLE device name during pairing.
* Synchronize LED and background in tutorial.
* Restart bluetooth on reboot from device menu.
* Removed "More info" menu item from screens that don't have more info.
* Fixed touch issue causing stuck hold-to-confirm buttons.
* Reduce +/- buttons' size to allow more text to fit.
* Add missing `get_serial_number` handler.
